channel.title: Updates on Nod's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Nod's Notes

item.title: The Monthly Patch 2025.01
item.description: The Monthly Patch 2025.01 Welcome to The Monthly Patch, a new blog series where I document my cybersecurity journey, both personal and professional. My goal with this blog is twofold: To serve as a motivational tool—tracking my progress and pushing myself to continuously improve. To provide a transparent record of my learning journey—allowing potential employers and like-minded professionals to see my dedication to cybersecurity growth. Each month, I’ll cover my progress, learning experiences, projects, and future goals.
